storyLine: A little boy named Andy loves to be in his room, playing with his toys, especially his doll named Woody". But
cast: what do the toys do when Andy is not with them
column4: they come to life. Woody believes that his life (as a toy) is good. However
column5: he must worry about Andy's family moving
column6: and what Woody does not know is about Andy's birthday party. Woody does not realize that Andy's mother gave him an action figure known as Buzz Lightyear
column7: who does not believe that he is a toy
column8: and quickly becomes Andy's new favorite toy. Woody
column9: who is now consumed with jealousy
column10: tries to get rid of Buzz. Then
column11: both Woody and Buzz are now lost. They must find a way to get back to Andy before he moves without them
column12: but they will have to pass through a ruthless toy killer

storyLine: Tom Sawyer is a mischievous young boy, growing up in a small US town in the mid-1800s. He finds a friend in Huckleberry Finn, a vagrant and outcast, and the two get up to all sorts of boyish adventures. While on one of these adventures they witness a murder, leaving Tom with a dilemma.
